p: The "themes" folder holds other projects that your project will inherit assets, content,
Every Plenti website can be used as a theme - in fact there is nothing special you would do
to your site to make it a "theme." Simply nest any Plenti site (if you have permission) in the "themes"
folder of your project and specify its folder name as the theme key in plenti.json.

sections.title: Omitting assets, content, or layout from a theme
